name: Pixel Boulder Game
description:
Pixel Boulder Game

Enjoy this little experiment and tribute to the game I loved playing when I was younger!

Controls

The controls are based on the Nes controller.

Click on the game to focus the keyboard towards the game!

  • You move with the [Arrow] keys
  • Submit is [A]
  • Cancel is [S]
  • Start is [Z]
  • Select is [X]
Create your own levels

You can create and play your custom levels here:

https://jordymoos.github.io/elm-pixel-boulder-game/

Why

A little nerdy experiment to make a game in a functional programming languages!

The code can be found here:

https://github.com/JordyMoos/elm-pixel-boulder-game
